reviewText: A wonderful insight into an amazing young woman about whom I knew very little. Anna Neagle, so often fobbed off as a lightweight actress, does a fine job, as usual, as Amy, while Robert Newton is well cast as the charismatic but unreliable alcoholic husband Jim Mollison.  Looking further into the real cause of the crash one is horrified to read that reports in more recent times suggest that Amy's plane might have been shot down by British forces, due to a fault in the system. However, we'll never know now which version is the truth.
